alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 7:23PM CDT until June 17 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CADDO AND NORTHWESTERN BOSSIER PARISHES... At 722 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Belcher, or 19 miles north of Shreveport, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Vivian, Plain Dealing, Oil City, Mooringsport, Hosston, Rodessa, Belcher, Ida, Gilliam, Dixie, Caddo Lake, Cavett and Bolinger. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
